assignmentText:
In this exercise you will explore several questions that relate to the conservation of matter: In the first part (A), you will see if you can confirm how matter is conserved when several salts are dissolved in water. In the second part (B), you will explore how matter is conserved in a chemical reaction.

Chem116 students should follow the recommended procedure and complete the report worksheet: Chem116ConMatter.doc.

(Note, the solution viewers and precise transfer mode have been disabled for this activity, you may find a graduated cylinder useful in performing this experiment.)
